thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Gaillon Opera - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic
thread.title_full: Fantastic - Review of BEST WESTERN Gaillon Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Liv18956
title: Fantastic
text: I stayed here for two nights in Feb 2017 for a short family break. The location of this hotel is great and is also close to the bus stop that will take you directly to/from Charles De Gaulle Airport. The staff here are friendly and seemed fluent in English too. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others and feel is good value for money.
